title: hexo安装与应用
content:
hexo安装1npm install hexo -g
初始化博客1hexo  init 文件名
安装依赖1npm install
本地预览博客1hexo serve /hexo s
终端的位置：对应目录下
自动部署发布工具：npm install hexo-deployer-git –save
1234deploy:  type: git  repository: https://github.com/jia-zheng-jing/jia-zheng-jing.github.io.git  branch: main 

 hexo init 文件名mpn install
发布生产public  —–hexo g预览  hexo -s
清除缓存 hexo clean生产public  hexo g本地预览 hexo shexo d

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server1$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files1$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
